name: Win His Heart Slots
description:
-Experience A Sensational Real Vegas Experience
Hit the jackpot, play bonus games, earn free spins and much more! Each slot machine has a different character to romance. The higher your level, the more characters and choice of machines you have. Play the game, raise your level and enjoy numerous love affairs!
Spin the slots with handsome anime characters! Try your luck in a real Vegas experience!

-Handsome anime characters
Slot machines feature handsome anime characters from the dating simulation game series “Shall we date?” created by NTT Solmare. The higher your level, the more characters and machines you will unlock. Play the game, raise your level and fall in love!

-Score Big Wins!
Each big win gives you an access to a bonus game. In Win His Heart Slots, you will be able to enjoy unprecedented fantastic bonus games featuring gorgeous anime characters. Spin the slots to win thrilling prizes and piles of coins!

-Breathtaking visual effects
In “Win His Heart Slots”, you can enjoy gorgeous visual effects characteristic of Japanese slot machines, never before seen in a video slots game.

-Features
◆Free to play!
◆Enjoy loads of perks! Login Bonus is available every day, a Time Bonus every few hours and Store Bonus in the store!
◆Exchange coins with your Facebook friends and get more!
◆Get carried away playing beautifully illustrated slots with fantastic sound! Win awesome Photos of your favorite characters!
◆Rank up among other players and get special gifts. Select your favorite avatar and stand out.
◆Slot machines and events are updated frequently! Enjoy an ever-lasting Romance Slot!

The World’s First Slots with a Roster of Hot Guys from the Shall we date? Series!
Have fun with your favorite characters from the popular love simulation game series Shall we date?,Raise your level and get unique Photos exclusive to this game!
Available series (more added soon):
Shall we date? Love Tangle+
Shall we date? Blood in Roses+
Shall we date? Wizardess Heart+
Shall we date? Ninja Shadow+
Shall we date? Guard me, Sherlock!+

“Shall we date?” series
NTT Solmare’s “Shall we date?” series is America’s favorite dating simulation series, enjoyed in 166 countries, with more than 32 million downloads from all over the world. “Shall we date?” games have received praise from fans worldwide.
“Win His Heart Slots” features anime characters from the top five most popular titles of “Shall we date?” for users to enjoy. Subsequent updates will introduce themes and characters from more games.

Note
This game was created in collaboration with NTT Solmare Corporation, producer of the Shall we date? series.
This game is intended for players over 21 years old.
Regardless of your results, it is NOT possible to exchange your win for real money.
Playing this game to improve your gambling skills does NOT guarantee wins in a real casino.
